dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3840 IH: Ensuring Sufficient Supply of Testing Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Dunn of Florida (for himself and Mrs. Dingell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize certain contracts and cooperative agreements with clinical laboratories for purposes of delivery of medical products to the Strategic National Stockpile.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring Sufficient Supply of Testing Act.

section.header: Contracts and cooperative agreements with clinical laboratories for the Strategic National Stockpile
section.text: Section 319F–2(a)(5)(A) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 247d–6b(a)(5)(A)) is amended by inserting after contracts or cooperative agreements with vendors, which may include manufacturers or distributors of medical products, the following: as well as clinical laboratories,.
